item.title: Apprentice Traveler (Level 1)
item.description: Streamed changes between another rcs with git svn or git p4.

item.title: Apprentice Collector (Level 3)
item.description: Fetches named heads or tags from another repository with git fetch

item.title: Cherry Picker
item.description: Used git cherry-pick to add a sha from another branch into the current branch.

item.title: Apprentice Miller (Level 2)
item.description: Add only part of a file to the stage 48 times with git add -p.

item.title: Apprentice Blacksmith (Level 2)
item.description: Created a branch using git checkout -b.

item.title: Apprentice Merchant (Level 2)
item.description: Added an external repository with git remote add.

item.title: Author (Level 5)
item.description: Made 2^Level commits using git commit.

item.title: Socialite (Level 5)
item.description: pushed a branch to a remote repository using git push

item.title: Apprentice Seamstress (Level 2)
item.description: amended a commit with git commit --amend.

item.title: Archivist (Level 5)
item.description: Prepare each commit with its patch in one file per commit with git format-patch

item.title: Apprentice Collector (Level 2)
item.description: Fetches named heads or tags from another repository with git fetch

item.title: Fisherman (Level 4)
item.description: Look for specified patterns in the current repository with git grep.

item.description: Prepare each commit with its patch in one file per commit with git format-patch

item.title: Apprentice Tree Trimmer (Level 3)
item.description: Rewrite branches with git filter-branch

item.description: amended a commit with git commit --amend.

item.title: Historian (Level 6)
item.description: Investigate the commit log using git log.
